name: TV Pets Multiple Choice Quiz | TV Mixture

questions.text: 'The Brady Bunch': their pet dog was named _____.
questions.explanation:
Tiger.

	Tiger only made a couple of appearances in all the years of 'TBB'. In his last appearance, the dog who played Tiger was killed before the episode was completed. The trainer substituted a look-alike dog who wasn't trained at all. The new dog wouldn't stay on marks, act on command. Instead, he piddled all over the place.

questions.text: 'Star Trek: Voyager': Before Capt. Janeway left Earth to take Voyager on its first mission, she left her dog with her fiance Mark. What breed of dog was she?
'Star Trek': Mr. Spock had a pet as a child called a sehlat. It would best be described as:
options: a cat with an electric charge
questions.explanation:
a bear-like creature with fangs.

	His mother told Dr. McCoy it was a live teddy bear. Spock clarified that by saying it was rather large with fangs.

questions.text: 'Friends': When Chandler and Joey were roommates, they had two pets, which were:
options: a Guinea pig and a hamster
questions.explanation:
a chicken and a duck.

	I was reminded that the chick was named Yasmine, after Yasmine Bleeth of 'Babe...' er, 'Baywatch'.

questions.text: 'Gentle Ben': The title character pet was a:
'Star Trek: The Next Generation': Data named his pet cat:
questions.explanation:
Spot.

	The cat was a male in story lines until they needed unborn kittens, then he became a she. Also, Spot was slightly striped.

questions.text: 'Flipper': The title character pet was a:
'Sesame Street': What is Elmo's pet goldfish's name?
questions.explanation:
Dorothy.

	Usually seen only in the 'Elmo's World' part of 'Sesame Street'.

questions.text: 'WKRP in Cincinnati': Herb Tarlek accidentally killed his daughter's pet:
questions.explanation:
Greenpeace the Frog.

	He accidentally painted it.

Pal.

	My first dog was named Pal, too.
